subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description:
1.2 Understanding enhanced among relevant stakeholders at national level of the linkages between national development, national polices and the Bali Action Bali negotiations.
1.3 Network of national stakeholders and policymakers created or consolidated to broaden the sectoral basis of national climate change policy formulation, enhancing integration of climate polices within development planning.
2.1 Capacity enhanced to assess opportunities to expand and optimize I&F flows to address climate change in up to 3 key sectors/economic activities
2.2 Capacity enhanced to link I&F flow assessments to policy options.
3.1 Knowledge platform launched and maintained.
3.2 Best practices and lessons learned documented and disseminated.

***The project activities have been delayed and the project will need additional time to finalize the key activities.  We estimate that These activities will conclude around the end of Oct 2011 but with many vendors to settle, we hope to close the project at the end of Feb 2012.
subproject.title: Policy Options to Address Clim
